title: HEC announces new dates of ETC tests
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 14 (APP): The Higher Education Commission’s (HEC) Education Testing Council (ETC) announced the rescheduling of admission and recruitment tests.
“The Undergraduate Studies Admission Test (USAT), the Higher Education Aptitude Test (HAT) for both MS/MPhil and PhD programs, and the AML/CFT Recruitment Test, originally scheduled for October 11-12, 2025, have all been moved and will now take place on Saturday, November 1, 2025, and Sunday, November 2, 2025,” said a press release on Tuesday.
“Furthermore, the Law Admission Test (LAT) is also being rescheduled from its original date of November 2, 2025. This examination will now be conducted on Sunday, November 9, 2025,” it added.
